Summary: Watching the sky and saw fast moving orange light
trends: There have been no other sightings in Lexington
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile sitting on my porch and watching the sky, I noticed an orange light moving pretty fast. It was rather large and seemed pretty high up. It was moving probably twice as fast as a plane. There was no observable sound. It was sort of hard to see because it was through a tree. Im 100% sure it wasnt a plane, satellite, or helicopter. I ran in to grab my ipod and film it but it was gone.
